github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commit format: type(scope): :gitmoji: description
Use imperative mood: 'Add feature' not 'Added feature'
Use types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, chore, ci
Include scope when relevant (e.g., api, ui, auth)
Use always a gitmoji defined in https://gitmoji.dev/ after type(scope): and before description
